description:
Kobungo`s family runs the Konaya bed-and-breakfast inn, and Kobungo himself is excellent at caring for people`s needs. Three years prior, he volunteered as a foot soldier and accompanied the soon to be husband of his sister, http://anidb.net/ch50983 [Genpachi], in an army deployment sent to contain an incident taking place in a remote northern village. There the whole squad has been killed by man-eating demons. Since then he is able to change into a demon himself.
He is the holder of the Brotherhood bead.
name: Inuta Kobungo
